metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19199 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.0. UriQuery.c allows an integer overflow via a uriComposeQuery* or uriComposeQueryEx* function because of an unchecked multiplication. It was discovered that uriparser mishandled certain input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause uriparser to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19199` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liburiparser1 - 0.8.4-1+deb9u2build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: uriparser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.4-1+deb9u2build0.18.04.1').
